attributes.action: Keep Gordon Brown at the head of the labour Party and as Prime Minister. He has done an excellent job so far and there is so much more i believe he can give.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has lead us thought the highs and lows throughout the last two years and if you believe he can take us further please sign the petition to keep Gordon Brown as Prime Minister. Because we believe Gordon Brown should not step down

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
